name: Strike Combat Pixel Online
description:
Looking for a S.W.A.T. vs Terrorists game? Strike Combat Pixel Online is a mixed both cs feel and crafting game
Play a fascinating dynamic first-person shooter Pixel with friends and other players online around the world .
** Modes **
Game has more than 3 different game modes from which you can select:
- Team Deathmatch
- Deathmatch (Player vs all)
- Normal
** Maps **
different maps, in which every day there are dynamic battles.
From small maps to a small group of friends, to large maps on which you have to work hard to win.
** Weapons **
More than 20 types of weapons like pistols, machine guns, shotguns, machine guns, rifles and melee weapons.
For better performance connect to router or 4G.
Take part in the vanguard on the battlefield of Strike combat Pixel Online!
made for fans of the good FPS games!
